tasks.label: üìã Log Claude Session (Detailed)
args:
mkdir -p .claude-logs && { echo '
## '$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M'); echo '**Description:** ${input:sessionDescription}'; echo '**Files Changed:** ${input:filesChanged}'; echo '**Status:** ${input:sessionStatus}'; echo '
### Changes'; git diff HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'No git changes detected'; echo ''; } >> .claude-logs/$(basename "$PWD").md && echo '‚úÖ Detailed log saved to .claude-logs/$(basename "$PWD").md'

tasks.label: üîç View Current Project Log
args: if [ -f .claude-logs/$(basename "$PWD").md ]; then cat .claude-logs/$(basename "$PWD").md; else echo '‚ùå No log file found for this project yet. Run a logging task first.'; fi

tasks.label: üìä View All Project Logs
args: if [ -d .claude-logs ]; then echo '=== Available Logs ===' && ls -lh .claude-logs/ && echo '' && echo '=== Recent Entries ===' && tail -n 20 .claude-logs/*.md 2>/dev/null || echo 'No logs yet'; else echo '‚ùå No .claude-logs directory found'; fi

tasks.label: üöÄ Setup Auto-Logging (Git Hook)
args:
mkdir -p .git/hooks && cat > .git/hooks/post-commit << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
PROJECT=$(basename "$PWD")
mkdir -p .claude-logs
echo "$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M') - Commit: $(git log -1 --pretty=%B)" >> .claude-logs/${PROJECT}.md
EOF
chmod +x .git/hooks/post-commit && echo '‚úÖ Auto-logging enabled! Every git commit will now log to .claude-logs/'

tasks.label: üíæ Commit & Log Claude Changes
args:
mkdir -p .claude-logs && git add -A && git commit -m '${input:commitMessage}' && echo '
## '$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')' - ${input:commitMessage}' >> .claude-logs/$(basename "$PWD").md && git diff HEAD~1 HEAD >> .claude-logs/$(basename "$PWD").md && echo '‚úÖ Committed and logged!'

tasks.label: üóëÔ∏è Clear Current Project Log
args: if [ -f .claude-logs/$(basename "$PWD").md ]; then rm .claude-logs/$(basename "$PWD").md && echo '‚úÖ Log cleared for this project'; else echo '‚ùå No log file found'; fi

tasks.label: üì§ Export Log Summary
args: if [ -f .claude-logs/$(basename "$PWD").md ]; then echo '=== Log Summary for '$(basename "$PWD")' ===' > claude-summary.txt && echo 'Generated: '$(date) >> claude-summary.txt && echo '' >> claude-summary.txt && tail -n 50 .claude-logs/$(basename "$PWD").md >> claude-summary.txt && echo '‚úÖ Summary exported to claude-summary.txt'; else echo '‚ùå No log file found'; fi
